snippet: While many people focused on the midterm elections, others became enamored of a young employee at a Target store in Texas.
abstract: Rise to online stardom of Alex Lee, 16-year-old Target employee from Texas, has raised questions about whether Internet sensation was clever marketing ploy or random phenomenon.
lead_paragraph: While many people focused on the midterm elections, others became enamored of a young employee at a Target store in Texas.

headline.main: Known as ‘Alex From Target,’ Teenage Clerk Rises to Star on Twitter and Talk Shows
headline.print_headline: Teenage Clerk Rises From Target to Star on Twitter and Talk Shows
